title: Glimpse of the Future - Support Kennen

embed.description: Glimpse of the Future - Support Kennen I'm playing Support Kennen live ! Introduction The 5.6 patch brought us a LOT of variety regarding the current metagame.

body:
Hey guys!

For this week article, I'm bringing you the first episode of my "_**Glimpse of the Future**_" serie. This one is about **Support Kennen**!

{{item:2049}} {{champion:85}} 

> You can read the article directly on Google Documents via the link in the article.

In this serie, I'm trying to predict what will be the upcoming unconventional picks and explain my reasoning. I'm also trying to give as much tips as I can on the character.

For this episode, we'll go over the strengths and weaknesses of Support Kennen and will take a look at his optimized stuff, runes and masteries.

Best of luck for your games and enjoy your read!

replies.body: stun is too unreliable and other than that no other cc or utility.
Next you'll be saying urgot will be meta.... Wait a minute....
